Hassan Alawie

Description

One day I was in a hospital after an intense basketball game (that’s all the context you’re getting). While waiting for a for a doctor or nurse to approach my group of friends, I decided to walk around and do a little exploring. It was this decision that led me to want to become a biomedical engineer. I was astounded by the different types of machinery that surrounded me and what they were capable of. As a result of this, after my friend got checked up, I immediately began researching the means of becoming a biomedical engineer and now, I attend Ryerson University in attempts to become one someday.
